data_details.label: Working memory
data_details.docstring: All the facts in the working memory of current step

data_details.label: Fired rules from start
data_details.docstring: Rules fired since the beginning of the process in sequence

data_details.label: Goals/Subgoals
data_details.docstring: Goal and subgoals (with their respective rule) until this step. Achieved subgoals should be removed

data_details.label: Remark
data_details.docstring: Can be used for any additional explanation

data: Since A and B are in the working memory, the condition is fulfilled which adds K into the working memory.
Since K and Q are in the working memory, the condition is fulfilled which adds W into the working memory.
Since G is in the working memory, the condition is fulfilled which adds R into the working memory.
Since Q and R are in the working memory, the condition is fulfilled which adds H into the working memory.

Since W and H are in the working memory, the condition is fulfilled which adds C into the working memory.
The algorithm ends as one of the possible goals has been met.
